landing.title: Songbox
landing.message: Hi there! Nice to see you again.

empty.title: This looks empty!
empty.subtitle: All items marked as favorite will appear here, regardless their path.

player.title: Player
player.desc: Customize your way to listen to your music.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.desc: The way you visualize your Songbox
appearance.showFileExtensionLabel: Show files extension (for audio files only)

help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Welcome to Songbox!
help.description: This page teaches you how to sign-up for Songbox, as well as how to use it to listen to music and manage your favorites. You can use Songbox both through mobile and on your computer's desktop. Songbox requires Internet access to use.

description.title: 🎵 What is Songbox?
description.description: Songbox is a free web service that allows users to listen to their music stored in Dropbox without having to install any app, directly from a web interface.

start.title: 🤔 What do I need to start using Songbox?
start.description: Songbox is free to use. All you need is a modern web browser and a Dropbox account.

favorite.title: ❤️ How do Favorites work?
favorite.description: Favorites is an special playlist you can create with your starred tracks.

step.two: All marked audios will appear in the section 'Favorites'
step.three: Click again the icon to delete a favorite

playlist.title: 📑 Can I create playlists?
playlist.description: You can use our 'Favorites' feature. Currently, we don't support custom playlists. But we will!

dark.title: 🕶 Is there a dark mode?
dark.description: Of course! You can configure some parameters in the 'Settings' section, the 'dark mode' toggle included.

creator.title: 🍍 Who is behind Songbox?
creator.description: TepacheLabs is a group of developers that enjoy creating services and tools in their free time. We created Songbox with our ❤️ and ☕️.
